description:
There was a reason why Komatsu became a glass blower - rumor has it,
some hot guy inspired him. I`ll bet you wanna know who that is. Huh?
You don`t? Come on, work with me, people! (sob...)
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Fated Encounter: Ushicou, Komatsu, and Salad Bowl
Unmei no Deai. Ushikou to Komatsu to Salad Bowl
運命の出会い. うしこうとこまつとサラダボウル
